text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump He issues travel restrictions, but allowed 40,000 people in from Wuhan on exceptions, he was calling the virus a Democratic HOAX on February 28 in South Carolina! He's lying while you watching! #DumpTrump #VoteBlueNoMatterWho #COVID19  he didn't keep transmission to a minimum! https://t.co/2r5TXvctmu
